bio.about: I've been working for more than 5 years as a Front-End developer. Throughout my career, I have worked on a wide range of projects, from small websites to large-scale applications. Whether working independently or as part of a team, I am committed to delivering outstanding work on time.

experiences.description: Started working as a full-time remote front-end developer at Buzzjective based in Berlin. I'm working on the front-end part of the project and communicating with international colleagues around the world.

Experience of being in a large-scale startup with a high number of users. I worked with experienced designers, developers, and product managers. I was responsible for code review, implementing, and maintaining the front-end part. Also I developed services like ADS (ads.basalam.com) and Karbalad (karbalad.basalam.com).
I've started front-end development journey and have gained a lot of experience in front-end.
